attributes.action: stop using UK taxpayer contributions to fund the activities of Tony Blair in his role in the Middle East.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair is no longer an employee, nor an elected representative of the people of the UK.  He is now an international representative who should be paid out of international funding.  This continued misappropriation of our taxpayer contributions has to be stopped.
